pull.title: test: fix MIN macro redefinition
pull.body:
Renames the `MIN` macro to `_TRACEPOINT_TEST_MIN`.

From #31418:

```
stderr:
/virtual/main.c:70:9: warning: 'MIN' macro redefined [-Wmacro-redefined]
   70 | #define MIN(a,b) ({ __typeof__ (a) _a = (a); __typeof__ (b) _b = (b); _a < _b ? _a : _b; })
      |         ^
include/linux/minmax.h:329:9: note: previous definition is here
  329 | #define MIN(a,b) __cmp(min,a,b)
      |         ^
1 warning generated.
```

fixes: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/31418

verification.payload:
tree 1f3dbdfdb6396a0015b75a71eef6818093315ff5
parent ae69fc37e4fff237a119225061d68f69e6cd61d7
author 0xb10c <b10c@b10c.me> 1733323877 +0100
committer 0xb10c <b10c@b10c.me> 1733323877 +0100

test: fix MIN macro-redefinition

Renames the `MIN` macro to `_TRACEPOINT_TEST_MIN`.

From #31418:

```
stderr:
/virtual/main.c:70:9: warning: 'MIN' macro redefined [-Wmacro-redefined]
   70 | #define MIN(a,b) ({ __typeof__ (a) _a = (a); __typeof__ (b) _b = (b); _a < _b ? _a : _b; })
      |         ^
include/linux/minmax.h:329:9: note: previous definition is here
  329 | #define MIN(a,b) __cmp(min,a,b)
      |         ^
1 warning generated.
```

fixes: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/31418

test: fix MIN macro-redefinition

Renames the `MIN` macro to `_TRACEPOINT_TEST_MIN`.

From #31418:

```
stderr:
/virtual/main.c:70:9: warning: 'MIN' macro redefined [-Wmacro-redefined]
   70 | #define MIN(a,b) ({ __typeof__ (a) _a = (a); __typeof__ (b) _b = (b); _a < _b ? _a : _b; })
      |         ^
include/linux/minmax.h:329:9: note: previous definition is here
  329 | #define MIN(a,b) __cmp(min,a,b)
      |         ^
1 warning generated.
```

fixes: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/31418
